string.string:
Source Code: https://github.com/jakobkreft/OnTime 

 Feedback: Please share your feedback here: https://github.com/jakobkreft/OnTime/issues/new/choose 

 Thank you! 

 OnTime is a simple app for managing time during live events, presentations, and speeches. It provides clear, color-coded alerts to help speakers stay on track. 

 Features:
 - Timer: Set total time, yellow warning, and red warning durations.
 - Color alerts like a traffic light: - Green: Time remaining. - Yellow: Warning phase. - Red: Critical or overtime.
 - Pause and Resume
 - Overtime Timer: Shows time over the set amount.
 - Saved Settings: Retains your preferences between sessions.
 - Multiple Timers: Swipe right to save a new timer. Swipe up do delete it.
